# GitHub Topics and Repository Configuration

This repository uses GitHub topics to help users discover it. The following topics are configured:

## Topics

- **django** - Backend framework
- **python** - Programming language
- **authentication** - User authentication system
- **student-club** - Student organization management
- **membership-system** - Member management
- **email-notifications** - Email system integration
- **crud** - Database operations
- **rest-api** - API functionality
- **responsive-design** - Mobile-friendly UI
- **open-source** - Community-driven project

## Repository Features

To enable maximum GitHub features, this repository includes:

- Security Policy (SECURITY.md)
- Code of Conduct (CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- Contributing Guidelines (CONTRIBUTING.md)
- Issue Templates (bug, feature, documentation)
- Pull Request Template
- GitHub Actions Workflows (CI/CD)
- License (MIT)
- Comprehensive Documentation

## Achievements Enabled

This repository is configured to unlock the following GitHub achievements:

### Contributions Achievements
- Your contributions (all commits with proper timestamps)
- Pull requests
- Code reviews
- Issue discussions

### Repository Achievements
- Security Policy Implementation
- Issue Templates (3+ types)
- Pull Request Template
- Code of Conduct
- Contributing Guidelines
- GitHub Actions Workflows
- Comprehensive Documentation

### Community Achievements
- Contributors list
- Discussion participation
- Open source contribution tracking

## Configuring Your Repository

To ensure all achievements are properly tracked:

1. Keep commits properly timestamped
2. Use descriptive commit messages
3. Follow conventional commits format
4. Add yourself to CONTRIBUTORS.md
5. Engage with issues and pull requests
6. Maintain documentation updates
7. Configure GitHub Topics (see list above)

## Achievement Tracking

Achievements are tracked through:
- Personal contribution profile
- Repository collaboration statistics
- Issue and pull request engagement
- Community participation metrics
- Security and policy compliance
